Posts.EditableText: Assuming the missing image is named `west pillar symbol.png` - you have the filename incorrect. It's used in two descriptions: * `It is an ancient pillar made of stone about waist height. It has the mystic symbol {img:West pillar symbol.png} carved on the side of it.` * The stone plinth has {img:west pillar symbol.png} carved into it. Note that the first one has a capital 'W' in the filename; in the second one it is lower case. The actual filename has a capital letter. I'm assuming that the desktop player doesn't check that the filenames match exactly; but accessing files over the web is case-sensitive. Hope that helps.
Posts.HTML:
Assuming the missing image is named west pillar symbol.png - you have the filename incorrect.

It's used in two descriptions:

  • It is an ancient pillar made of stone about waist height. It has the mystic symbol {img:West pillar symbol.png} carved on the side of it.
  • The stone plinth has {img:west pillar symbol.png} carved into it.

Note that the first one has a capital 'W' in the filename; in the second one it is lower case. The actual filename has a capital letter.
I'm assuming that the desktop player doesn't check that the filenames match exactly; but accessing files over the web is case-sensitive.

Hope that helps.
